name: Messi Ninja Endless Runner
description:
Messi Ninja Endless Runner has Beautiful graphics with a highly polished interface inspired by Kiloo and Sybo.

How to Play:
- Swipe Left - Move Left
- Swipe Right - Move Right
- Swipe Up - Jump
- Swipe Down - Slide

Run as fast as you can and dodge oncoming obstacles!


What are you waiting for, download Messi Ninja Endless Runner the great game right now, the cop has started chasing you.
In this Messi Ninja Endless Runner you are running as ninja runner and lets see and rush how long can you run before you get caught by police inspector and law enforcement authorities.

As an Messi Ninja Endless Runner, you have to run for your life and overcome the hurdles set by police also you will get some special powers like jetpack magnet hoverboard and many more and it may be also games for girls like aina,chicky and laura and games for guy like izzy anyway this Ninja subway endless runner is very awesome game I hope you like it.
